alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; Oconee; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Oconee, southeastern Barrow, north central Morgan, southern Clarke and northeastern Walton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Gratis, or 7 miles southeast of Winder, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Winder, Monroe, Watkinsville, Statham, Bogart, North High Shoals, Bethlehem, Bostwick, Good Hope, Bishop, Whitehall, Athens-Clarke County, Beechwood Hills, Eastville, Nicholasville, Campton, Gratis, State Botanical Garden Of Ga, and Russell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
